A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a total crap\, doesn't fit in SW philosophy. So many cheesy lines ruined the SW feeling. I could not accept how Snoke was introduced in SW: TFA - like out of nowhere\, but I lived with it. But now I cant accept it even more how he is so swiftly eliminated. Rian undid what JJ Adams did in TFA: Snoke\, Phasma\, The First order. Everything is pointless. Watch TFA and TLJ together\, you are left with nothing but VFX. 2 hours without a story. In my heart\, SW has only 6 movies.
